title: Riven is balanced, stop complaining
body:
While I agree her mobility is high along with her damage, let's not forget the "Riven Main Syndrome" which affects most of the players of the Exile, making them go allin every single time they can, 1v5'ing and building no resist or armor at all, while being toxic as no one else has ever been. Therefore, except for a few subjects, Riven is balanced for all these psychological restraints she puts in them.
:^)
